name: SPOKANE COUNTY DETENTION SERVICES
sampleDescriptions: Assist the Spokane County Detention Services Department in re-negotiating its US Marshals Service Intergovernmental Agreement for housing federal prisoners at the Spokane County Jail.
Assist the Spokane County Detention Services Department in re-negotiating its US Marshals Service Intergovernmental Agreement for housing federal prisoners at the Spokane County Jail.
Assist Spokane County Detention Services with issues related to negotiating a new higher per diem rate for housing federal prisoners for U.S. Marshals Service.
